text: Persea glabra is a species of plant in the family Lauraceae. It is endemic to Brazil. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Persea glabra. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. Category:Flora of Brazil glabra Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Persea glabra
